attributes.action: Don’t apply the new ILR rule changes for who are already in existing pathway.
attributes.additional_details: Applying new ILR rules to people already on the 5-year path is unfair because they planned their lives around the original requirements. Changing rules mid-journey harms their stability, creates unexpected burdens, and breaks legitimate expectations.
attributes.background: Please do not apply new ILR rule changes to those already on the 5-year pathway. Doing so is unfair and harms people who relied on the original rules. Parliament should justify this unfairness and protect current people.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751517
